originalText.text:
Blanca‚Äôs minority owned and family operated business has no reason to ever be categorized as your average cleaners.

She‚Äôs altered every single pant and suit of mine, as well as most of my coats (as I‚Äôve lost weight over time( since I found her back in 2014 when I worked in the area and I have ZERO PLANS OF GOING ELSEWHERE, even though I live in East Bronx.

I travel to her specifically for her and her sons, Alex & Chris (who run the front desk), STELLAR customer service, exceptional pricing, quick turnaround and ATTENTION TO DETAIL. I‚Äôm actually in the process of looking for fabrics for her to make me a pair of custom pants - please visit her frequently, this is a vital local business to the neighborhood and without her we would pay an arm and leg for sub-par EVERYTHING.

Thank you Blanca, Chris and Alex for consistently being amazing and dedicated to maintaining great relationships and saving us all money by taking great care of our wardrobe.

originalText.text: I live in Hudson Yards and come here for all my alternations. This place did an amazing job shortening the sleeves on my leather jacket which had very thick material. After the work was done the alteration was not noticeable. I've brought a lot of designer items here to be altered and the work is exceptional every time.

After the work was done the alteration was not noticeable. I've brought a lot of designer items here to be altered and the work is exceptional every time.

originalText.text: I have been going to Blanca's for 3 years now. Even though I've moved around the neighborhood and there are there are other places closer, I have always gone to Blanca's because the service is top notch. Blanca and the team are incredibly helpful and responsive. I've never had issues in these 3 years, and feel that I can trust them with any of my clothes. I highly recommend Blanca's for anyone looking for dry cleaning, laundry, or alterations.

originalText.text: Would not recommend - I used their laundry services for a few months while my building hasn‚Äôt had a working laundry room and have had a number of items lost or damaged. When I finally called after one delivery asking them to look for missing items from that bag I was told it wasn‚Äôt possible that they had lost my items and they never followed up.
